    Anomaly Detection for TS Resources•

    Time Series
    30-11-2020 / Edit on Github
    1. Book & tutorials
    2. Libraries
    3. Other resources

    This note contains good resources for Time Series Anomaly Detection problems.

    Book & tutorials #

    1. Practical Machine Learning - A new look at Anomaly Detection - Ted Dunning & Ellen Friedman -- clear explanation -- pdf

    Libraries #

    1. Anomaly Detection Tool Kit (ADTK) -- many examples and cases with codes -- docs -- github.
    2. PyODDS -- docs -- github

    Other resources #

    1. awesome-TS-anomaly-detection
    2. Machine Learning Awesome List - section "Time Series Anomaly Detection".
    3. Scitkit-learn -- Comparing anomaly detection algorithms for outlier detection on toy datasets
    4. awesome anomaly detection - section "Time-series anomaly detection"

    •Notes with this notation aren't good enough. They are being updated.
